it.unica.foresee.libraries
Class NearestNeighbour<T extends DatasetSparseVector<? extends NumberElement>>

java.lang.Object
  it.unica.foresee.libraries.NearestNeighbour<T>

public class NearestNeighbour<T extends DatasetSparseVector<? extends NumberElement>>
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an implementation of the nearest neighbour algorithm for user similarity.

Constructor Summary

          Calculates the predictions for each non rated item for each user in the dataset.

Get the n nearest neighbours to the given user

Parameters:

public double userSimilarity(double[] user,

Calculates the Pearson similarity of the items rated by both of the users.

Parameters:
user - a user array of values common between user and neighbour
neighbour - a neighbour array of values common between user and neighbour
Returns:
